event.title: Theodor Heuss Medal, Stuttgart, Germany
event.body: On Friday afternoon several people from us will be present at this years workshop of the Theodor Heuss Foundation with the topic "social market economy and globalisation". On Saturday the cermony for the Theodor Heuss medal starts at 10 am and will last until around 12:30. The event takes place in the "Alte Reithalle" in Stuttgart, near the central station. You need an invitation from the Theodor Heuss Foundation to participate at the event. But if you are interested to join us in the celebration, we have a small amount of invitations left. So please contact our German team.
